name.ja: <ruby>救<rt>きゅう</rt></ruby><ruby>惺<rt>せい</rt></ruby><ruby>望<rt>ぼう</rt></ruby><ruby>御<rt>ぎょ</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: When your opponent draws a card during their turn, or when your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster during their turn, send 1 monster from your field to the Graveyard.

effect.en: Your opponent can only declare an attack once this turn. Then, you can take control of 1 face-up Level 9 or higher Magical Knight Type Fusion Monster whose original ATK is 3000 on your opponent's field.
